gui.mmic.sessions.migrate.confirm:
Are you sure you want to migrate sessions from other Minecraft instances?
This is not guaranteed to find all instances present on your computer.
gui.mmic.sessions.clear.confirm:
Are you sure you want to clear ALL your sessions forever?
This action cannot be undone.
options.mmic.lagType.tip:
Changes the type of lag caused by the lag switch

BLOCK causes all packets sent by the client to be
completely ignored

CLOG blocks all packets and sends them all at once
when the lag switch is disabled

LOSSY_BLOCK causes a randomly chosen 25% of all
packets to be blocked

LOSSY_CLOG causes a randomly chosen 25% of all
packets to be blocked and sent when lag is toggled off
options.mmic.autoplant.tip:
Automatically replant harvested crops.
This only works if seeds of the harvested
crops are in your hotbar.
options.mmic.gridColor.tip:
Changes the color of the togglable grids (thirds,
halves etc.)
options.mmic.gammaStep.tip:
Changes by how much % the brigthness will change
when using the brightness buttons
options.mmic.miniF3.tip:
Replaces the default Debug HUD (F3 menu) with a new,
smaller one which displays only the most important information.
options.mmic.blockOutlineColor.tip: Changes the color of the block outline
options.mmic.zoomFovDiv.tip:
Changes how much zoom is applied.
The range is 1.0-10.0, where 1.0 is no zoom.
options.mmic.zoomSensDiv.tip:
Changes how much mouse sensitivity is decreased when zooming.
The range is 1.0-10.0, where 1.0 is no difference.
options.mmic.centeredSigns.tip: Moves sign text to be always vertically centered.
options.mmic.perfectSigns.tip: Removes the tiny gap between the sign and the wall.
options.mmic.dotXhair.tip: Turns the default crosshair into a dot.
options.mmic.dotSize.tip:
Changes the size of the crosshair if Dot Crosshair
is enabled.
options.mmic.dynamicDot.tip:
Makes the Dor Crosshair change size depending on
movement speed.
options.mmic.migrationDepth.tip:
Changes how far session migration will
search.
(i.e. the higher this number, the more
folders it will search through)
